LoginText: Ready to explore more? Login now to access your account
CreateAccountText: Unlock a world of fun and education!
MemorizedSurahsText: This show the surahs you have memorized. Aim high and fill your heart with the words of the Quran.
MemorizedJuzzText: This show the juz you have memorized. Aim high and fill your heart with the words of the Quran.
StarsEarnedText: Each Star represents your success in Surah quizzes. More stars mean better understanding and rewards!
CompletedSurahsText: Trach how many Surahs you've read and explored. Keep progressing to unlock more!
ForgotPasswordText: Enter your email here to recieve verification OTP
NewPasswordText: Enter your new password and rewrite it.
LoginToTrackYourProgressText: To access more Surahs and take tests to track your progress, please log into your account.
OTPText: An otp has been sent to your email. Please check your inbox.
DeleteAccount1: Are you sure you want to Delete your Account?
DeleteAccount2: You will lose all your Progress.
Areyousureyouwanttounmarkthissurahasmemo: Are you sure you want to unmark this surah as memorized?
Areyousureyouwanttounmarkthisjuzzasmemor: Are you sure you want to unmark this juzz as memorized?
